titles.title: Charitable Goods Donation Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the charitable contributions deduction for food inventory, book inventory, and computer technology and equipment.
Charitable Goods Donation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Charitable Goods Donation Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2010 the tax deductions for contributions of food and book inventory and for contributions of computer technology or equipment to schools and public libraries.
